page.title: 02FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Mum and dad get up and wake my brother at 7.30.When my dad goes to work.My brother goes to work at 8.00. At 8.10 I get dressed.And go down to breakfast. At 8.40 I go to school.At 9.30 my mum goes to work. My brother works at a butchers in Comberton.He has a day off on Monday and Sunday.My mum goes to work at Wallis Farm,she is a home help.She works three days a at Mrs Sadlers and one day at Mrs Jones. My dad works at Chivers Farm.He sprays the plants and stakes them in.Normally on summer evenings we do some gardening or I play with some of my friends.At weekends we have a quiet time visiting friends or going out.
